FuncDef: The display access-user user-name-table statistics command displays statistics on users who access the network after the number of users is limited based on the user name. The display access-user user-name-table statistics command displays statistics on users who access the network after the number of users is limited based on the user name. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
CLIs: display access-user user-name-table statistics { all | username <username> }

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics on users with a specified user name.
The value is a string of 1 to 253 case-sensitive characters.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display access-user user-name-table statistics username test@hw
